main event: One round reddish object, the size of a basketball at arm's length, was observed in Atlanta, Georgia on 24th October 1957 at 1855Z for 1 to 1.5 minutes following a course of 150 to 180 degrees. The observation was made using ground-radar.
interesting points: The object was described as round and reddish, with a size similar to that of a basketball at arm's length, giving a tangible sense of its dimensions.
The duration of the observation, along with the flight path, suggested that the sighting was probably caused by an aircraft, indicating a possible prosaic explanation.
The report is from an old UFO document from Project Blue Book, adding to the historical significance of the sighting.
The observation was made using ground-radar, indicating the use of advanced technology for monitoring and recording the UFO sighting.
The location of the sighting in Atlanta, Georgia adds specific geographical context to the event.
